add_habit_to_start: Add a habit to start tracking.
select_challenge_required: Select a challenge or uncheck "Part of Challenge"
add_habit_to_challenge_description: To complete the challenge, add one or more habits to it.
delete_habit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?
delete_habit_description: If you delete it, its history will also be lost. If you want to stop tracking this habit, change its end date instead.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
logout_error: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.
delete_account_error: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.
notifications_permission_denied: To enable notifications, you need to grant permissions in the app settings.
notifications_error: An error occurred while configuring notifications. Please try again.
duration_days: How many days does the challenge last
duration_days_required: Select a number of days between 1 and 1000
create_new_habit_first: Create a habit first to add it to the challenge
delete_challenge_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete this challenge?
delete_habit_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete this habit from the challenge?
no_recorded_habits: You don't have any recorded habits for this day.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
no_habits_in_challenge_description: Add a habit to the challenge to complete it.
no_habits_available: No available habits, add a habit first to select it.
onboarding_track_habits_description: Start building better habits and track your progress every day
onboarding_challenges_description: Join challenges and motivate yourself with others
onboarding_stats_description: Analyze your progress and celebrate successes
login_required: You must be logged in to start a challenge
challenge_start_error: An error occurred while starting the challenge
no_active_challenges: No active challenges, first create a challenge.
no_active_habits: No active habits, first create a habit.
contact_description: Report a problem or suggest a new feature
email_client_not_available: Email client is not available on your device. Please make sure you have an email app installed.
offline_mode_description: Please check your internet connection. Some features may be limited while offline.
before_photo_description: This photo will only be visible to you in the challenge summary and only if you attach after photo after completing the challenge.
add_after_photo_description: Add a photo that shows the results of your challenge
after_photo_description: This photo will only be visible to you in the challenge summary and only if you attached before photo
delete_photo_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?
add_firends_description: Add friends to complete challenges together, track their progress and motivate each other.
friend_request_error: Provided user ID is not valid
friend_request_error_description: Please check if the user ID is correct and try again.
